name: EvolutionX
changelog: • This is the initial release for Laurel sprout, based on A15 QPR1 with February security patches.
notes:
• THIS IS NOT PowerX-NOT'S VERSION!! This build is made by a different person, and is not the same as PowerX-NOT version. For that specific version, go here instead
  • Please note that we don't support rooting officially.
  • Due to my huge amount of devices, if you need to contact me, I'll be slow to answer in XDA or on telegram. The best will be to join my discord server to stay up-to-date
  • For more details, check the XDA thread or EvolutionX website.
